name: @sassoftware/restaf
description: Library for writing SAS Viya application using REST APIs
author: Deva Kumaraswamy <deva.kumar@sas.com>

scripts.build: rimraf dist  && npm run build:node && npm run build:web
scripts.build:node: webpack --env target=node p=n --config webpack.config.umd.js && webpack --env target=node p=y --config webpack.config.umd.js
scripts.build:web: webpack --env target=web p=n --config webpack.config.umd.js && webpack --env target=web p=y --config webpack.config.umd.js
scripts.build:esm: webpack --env target=web p=n --config webpack.esm.config.js && webpack --env target=web p=y --config webpack.esm.config.js
